##  Sequential Analyses Only

```{r, cache=FALSE, results="asis", echo=FALSE}
	seq.only.grd <- setdiff(params$seq.grades, params$skip.grades)
	seq.only.plots <- NULL

	for (ca in params$GL_subjects) {
		seq.plots <-  unique(gsub(".png|.pdf", "", list.files(file.path(params$gof.path.seq[[1]], paste0(ca, ".2019")))))
		seq.plots <- seq.plots[order(seq.plots)][seq.plots != "Decile_Tables"]

		tmp.prg <- sapply(seq.plots, function(f) strsplit(f, ";")[[1]])
		tmp.grd <- sapply(tmp.prg, function(f) gsub(paste0("2019_", sub("MATHEMATICS", "MATH", ca), "_"), "", f[1]))

		seq.only.plots <- c(seq.only.plots, file.path(params$gof.path.seq[[1]], paste0(ca, ".2019"), paste0(seq.plots[tmp.grd==seq.only.grd], ".pdf")))
	}

	if (length(params$GL_subjects) > 2) tmp.width <- 0.3 else tmp.width <- 0.5 # maybe do two pages since it creates a second page anyway with more than 2 subjects

	placeFigure(
			files = seq.only.plots,
			rows = 1, columns = 2, pdf.width = tmp.width,
			caption = paste("Sequential growth goodness of fit plots for grade", seq.only.grd, params$GL_text,"(no skip-year analyses)"))
```
